ValidationRule.description: You cannot enter a date in Send to CAM to Trade FF's and Send to CAM to Trade Alloc
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISBLANK( Send_to_CAM_to_Trade_Allocation__c )) && NOT( ISBLANK( Send_to_CAM_to_Trade_Forfeitures__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter a date in Send to CAM to Trade FF's and Send to CAM to Trade Alloc
